title: When someone likes your Marble Malphite Skin

replies.body: As his smooth rock slides aggressively  inside my........

donkey was stuck between a rock and a hard place.

Malphite really was rock solid.

Malphite was going as fast as he could.

donkey needed to stay down for this encounter.



the proper context would be a gif of malphite spamming laugh, but I couldn't find one.

no mention of his unstoppable force? 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
that would make it monkey. Also, donkey is already married to a DRAGON.

Marble Malphite looks like white dried dog shit.  It's the spikes on his back, they are literal dried up dog turds. That being said best skin. No other skin allows me to hurl a metric ton of shit at my enemy with mach speed.

{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} 

Now I need this skin to become the fastest moving pile of crap the Rift has ever seen.

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} 
Rip {{champion:75}} . You're digestion never looked so lethal.
